DOC.brief_summary: This study include 2 phase . During phase 1 , pregnant woman follow course pregnancy . The phase 2 follow-up mother-child dyad 3 5 year delivery . The purpose phase 1 : - ass contribution interaction adipokines development insulin resistance pregnancy gestational diabetes ; - ass level maternal adipokines determinant development fetal growth ; - determine genetic variation influence level adipokines glucose regulation pregnancy newborn . The purpose phase 2 : - identify DNA methylation variation birth predictive childhood overweight/obesity . - identify maternal characteristic associate DNA methylation variation predictive childhood overweight/obesity . - establish whether loci predictive childhood overweight/obesity birth still differentially methylated 5 year age ( sample collect 5 year age ) . - identify DNA methylation variation birth predictive childhood neurodevelopment problem 3 5 year age .
DOC.brief_title: Role Adipokines Glucose Regulation During Pregnancy Fetal Development
